actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hell hound makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hound exhales fire in a 15foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 DEX save, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Prey Sense
special_abilities.desc: The hound can pinpoint, by scent, the location of Medium and smaller creatures within 30 feet of it.
